original_text: A man was there. His hand was very small and weak, so he could not use it. Some Pharisees asked Jesus, ‘Is it right to make someone well again on our day of rest?’ They wanted to find a reason to say that Jesus was doing wrong things.
korean_text: 한쪽 손 마른 사람이 있는지라 사람들이 예수를 고발하려 하여 물어 이르되 안식일에 병 고치는 것이 옳으니이까

sentences.original_text: His hand was very small and weak
so he could not use it.
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그는 그것을 사용할 수 없었습니다.

sentences.original_text: 'Is it right to make someone well again
They wanted to find a reason
to say that Jesus was doing wrong things.
sentences.korean_translation: 예수님이 잘못된 일을 하고 있다고 말하기 위한 이유를요.
